name: Green Zone Safety Camp
description: A fortified former high school and surrounding neighborhood that serves as one of the last secure human settlements in the region. Fifteen-foot walls made of concrete barriers, shipping containers, and scavenged materials surround the perimeter, with guard towers at strategic points. Inside, nearly 200 survivors have created a fragile community.

connectedLocations.description: A partially collapsed shopping mall two miles east that may still contain supplies but is known to be infested with infected.
The ruins of County General Hospital, a dangerous but potentially resource-rich location.

parentLocation.description: The Eastbrook Safety Zone is located in what was once a suburban area outside a mid-sized Midwestern city.

subLocations.description: The former principal's office and administrative area, now serving as the command and operations center for the safety zone.
The converted gymnasium now serves as a medical facility, currently under strain from a shortage of antibiotics.

pointsOfInterest.name: Eastern Wall Breach
pointsOfInterest.description: A section of the eastern perimeter wall that shows recent damage from what appears to be a coordinated attack by infected.

pointsOfInterest.name: Community Garden
pointsOfInterest.description: A carefully tended vegetable garden in the former athletic field, providing crucial fresh food for the settlement.

pointsOfInterest.name: Armory
pointsOfInterest.description: A heavily guarded room containing the settlement's limited supply of weapons and ammunition.

historyLog.description: The player was admitted to the safety zone after being found scavenging nearby.
Captain Rivera ordered increased patrols along the eastern wall after sensors detected unusual activity.

notes: Morale at the safety zone is deteriorating due to dwindling supplies and increasing infected attacks. Three residents disappeared last week, leading to suspicions of either infected infiltration or desperate desertion.
